item.title: Taro打包静态文件
item.description: 小程序需要添加音效和背景音乐，网络加载会有一定延迟，音效文件也不大，直接打包进小程序 修改config/index.jx { ... copy: { patterns: [ { from: 'src/audio/', to: 'dist/audios/', ignore: ['*.js'] }, //把src下audio目录复制到编译后的dist/audios目录 ], options: { } } 点击按钮时播放音效 const click = () => { const innerAudioContext = Taro.createInnerAudioContext() innerAudioContext.autoplay = false innerAudioContext.loop = false innerAudioContext.src = `audios/test.mp3` innerAudioContext.play() }
